name: Date Sweetened No Bake Chocolate Bites
description: Healthy, guilt-free no bake treats that are sure to satisfy your chocolate cravings.

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor with an "S" blade, add the walnuts, dates and cocoa powder.
recipeInstructions.name: In a food processor with an "S" blade, add the walnuts, dates and cocoa powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Process until a sticky dough is formed, about 1-2 minutes. You may need to scrape the sides of your food processor a few times so that it will come together. You should be able to easily roll it into balls without the dough falling apart.
recipeInstructions.name: Process until a sticky dough is formed, about 1-2 minutes. You may need to scrape the sides of your food processor a few times so that it will come together. You should be able to easily roll it into balls without the dough falling apart.

recipeInstructions.text: If it still seems dry, add 1 tablespoon of water at a time until the dough is sticky and uniform, being careful not to add too much water.
recipeInstructions.name: If it still seems dry, add 1 tablespoon of water at a time until the dough is sticky and uniform, being careful not to add too much water.

recipeInstructions.text: Roll into tablespoon sized balls and place in a container. Store in the fridge or freezer.
recipeInstructions.name: Roll into tablespoon sized balls and place in a container. Store in the fridge or freezer.
